info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about Excuse mewhich way is Marcel Duchamp's urinal?
info.completion: A woman is walking through a museum when she comes across a urinal. She looks at the sign next to it and sees that it says "Marcel Duchamp's Urinal." She turns to the man next to her and says, "Excuse me, which way is Marcel Duchamp's urinal?"

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about I put some beer on the hook. I figure if that's what got him into this mess it should be able to get him out.
info.completion: I put some beer on the hook. I figure if that's what got him into this mess it should be able to get him out. So, I wait a few minutes and sure enough, a fish comes swimming by, takes the beer, and swims away.

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about Don't look at me that wayI wanted a giant cat.
info.completion: I tried to get a giant cat, but it just wouldn't work out. I even went to the store and bought a big bag of cat food, but the cashier just looked at me funny and said, "Don't look at me that way."

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about I wanted you to meet our colon specialist before we miniaturized him.
info.completion: I wanted you to meet our colon specialist before we miniaturized him. He's a great guy, but he's really tiny.

info.prompt: Give a funny scenario for Tell a joke about He has a summer job as a scarecrow.
info.completion: The scarecrow is having a tough time scaring the birds away. One day, he comes up with a brilliant idea to wear a mask. The next day, he puts on the mask and scares all of the birds away.
